GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on block address in f2fs_do_zero_range()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit f2e1c38b5ac64eb1a16a89c52fb419409d12c25b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on block address in f2fs_do_zero_range()
